scripts.cy:run:chrome: cypress run --reporter mochawesome --browser chrome --config video=false,videoUploadOnPasses=false --spec "cypress/integration/main/**/*" && --reporter mochawesome cypress run --browser chrome --spec "cypress/integration/auth/**/*"
scripts.cy:run:firefox: cypress run --reporter mochawesome --browser firefox --config video=false,videoUploadOnPasses=false --spec "cypress/integration/main/**/*" && --reporter mochawesome cypress run --browser firefox --spec "cypress/integration/auth/**/*"
